snippet.title: Sticky Struggles - Launch Trailer (App Store, Google Play & Amazon Appstore)
snippet.description:
Sticky Struggles is now available on App Store, Google Play and Amazon Appstore!

Download Sticky Struggles now for FREE!
▶ App Store (iOS): https://apps.apple.com/app/sticky-struggles/id1658302212
▶ Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PactionGamesApS.StickyStruggles
▶ Amazon Appstore: https://amazon.com/dp/B0BP81NDDB/ref=apps_sf_sta

With 50+ levels of increasing difficulty and new obstacles to overcome, Sticky Struggles will keep you entertained for hours!

⭐ ACHIEVEMENTS — There are plenty of achievements to earn, can you collect them all?

⭐ RELAX AND FOCUS — Enjoy a minimalist game world with relaxing music. No flashy visuals and loud sound effects.

⭐ LOTS OF LEVELS — Play through 50 challenging levels! You can unlock bonus levels for a small fee.

⭐ CHALLENGING — There are multiple ways to solve each level. Can you figure out how to solve it in the lowest amount of moves possible?

⭐ 2D & 3D — You can easily toggle between 2D and 3D view.

⭐ PLAY OFFLINE — Take your game anywhere, no internet connection required!

⭐ FREE! — Sticky Struggles is completely free to play!

*********

▶ Subscribe to Paction Games for more: https://www.youtube.com/pactiongames/?sub_confirmation=1

▶ Follow us on Social Media: 
www.stickystruggles.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pactiongames/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pactiongames/
Twitter: @pactiongames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pactiongames/

*********

Paction Games, the Paction Games logo, Sticky Struggles, the Sticky Struggles logo as well as any materials derived from Sticky Struggles are trademarks or registered trademarks of and/or owned by Paction Games ApS, including, without limitation, artwork, character art, titles and designs. App Store and the App Store logo are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC.. Amazon, Amazon Appstore, and their associated logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.
